verses.verse: Moreover David <S%H1732><s%> and the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%> separated <S%H914><s%> to the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph, <S%H623><s%> and of Heman, <S%H1968><s%> and of Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> who should prophesy <S%H5012><s%> with harps, <S%H3658><s%> with psalteries, <S%H5035><s%> and with cymbals: <S%H4700><s%> and the number <S%H4557><s%> of the workmen <S%H582><s%> <S%H4399><s%> according to their service <S%H5656><s%> was:

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph; <S%H623><s%> Zaccur, <S%H2139><s%> and Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and Nethaniah, <S%H5418><s%> and Asarelah, <S%H841><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%> under <S%H5921><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of Asaph, <S%H623><s%> which prophesied <S%H5012><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the order <S%H3027><s%> of the king. <S%H4428><s%>

Of Jeduthun: <S%H3038><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun; <S%H3038><s%> Gedaliah, <S%H1436><s%> and Zeri, <S%H6874><s%> and Jeshaiah, <S%H3470><s%> Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> and Mattithiah, <S%H4993><s%> six, <S%H8337><s%> under <S%H5921><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of their father <S%H25><s%> Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> who prophesied <S%H5012><s%> with a harp, <S%H3658><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> and to praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Of Heman: <S%H1968><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heman: <S%H1968><s%> Bukkiah, <S%H1232><s%> Mattaniah, <S%H4983><s%> Uzziel, <S%H5816><s%> Shebuel, <S%H7619><s%> and Jerimoth, <S%H3406><s%> Hananiah, <S%H2608><s%> Hanani, <S%H2607><s%> Eliathah, <S%H448><s%> Giddalti, <S%H1437><s%> and Romamtiezer, <S%H7320><s%> Joshbekashah, <S%H3436><s%> Mallothi, <S%H4413><s%> Hothir, <S%H1956><s%> and Mahazioth: <S%H4238><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heman <S%H1968><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> seer <S%H2374><s%> in the words <S%H1697><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> to lift <S%H7311><s%> up the horn. <S%H7161><s%> And God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Heman <S%H1968><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6246><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> were under <S%H5921><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of their father <S%H25><s%> for song <S%H7892><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> with cymbals, <S%H4700><s%> psalteries, <S%H5035><s%> and harps, <S%H3658><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the king's <S%H4428><s%> order <S%H3027><s%> to Asaph, <S%H623><s%> Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> and Heman. <S%H1968><s%>

So the number <S%H4557><s%> of them, with their brothers <S%H251><s%> that were instructed <S%H3925><s%> in the songs <S%H7892><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> that were cunning, <S%H995><s%> was two hundred <S%H3967><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and eight. <S%H8083><s%>

And they cast <S%H5307><s%> lots, <S%H1486><s%> ward <S%H4931><s%> against <S%H5980><s%> ward, <S%H4931><s%> as well the small <S%H6996><s%> as the great, <S%H1419><s%> the teacher <S%H995><s%> as the scholar. <S%H8527><s%>

Now the first <S%H7223><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> for Asaph <S%H623><s%> to Joseph: <S%H3130><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> to Gedaliah, <S%H1436><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> with his brothers <S%H251><s%> and sons <S%H1121><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The third <S%H7992><s%> to Zaccur, <S%H2139><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The fourth <S%H7243><s%> to Izri, <S%H3339><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The fifth <S%H2549><s%> to Nethaniah, <S%H5418><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The sixth <S%H8345><s%> to Bukkiah, <S%H1232><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The seventh <S%H7637><s%> to Jesharelah, <S%H3480><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The eighth <S%H8066><s%> to Jeshaiah, <S%H3470><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The ninth <S%H8671><s%> to Mattaniah, <S%H4983><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The tenth <S%H6224><s%> to Shimei, <S%H8096><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The eleventh <S%H6240><s%> to Azareel, <S%H5832><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Shubael, <S%H7619><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Mattithiah, <S%H4993><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Jeremoth, <S%H3406><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The sixteenth <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Hananiah, <S%H2608><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Joshbekashah, <S%H3436><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The eighteenth <S%H6240><s%> to Hanani, <S%H2607><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The nineteenth <S%H8672><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Mallothi, <S%H4413><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Eliathah, <S%H448><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The one <S%H259><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Hothir, <S%H1956><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The two <S%H8147><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Giddalti, <S%H1437><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The three <S%H7969><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Mahazioth, <S%H4238><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>
The four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Romamtiezer, <S%H7320><s%> he, his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> were twelve. <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%>
